WorkPlace.Name: RANDSTAD A/S
WorkPlace.Description: Randstad er en del af den internationale Randstad Group, der er verdens andenstørste udbyder af HR-løsninger. Hver dag formidler Randstad arbejde til mere end 500.000 mennesker i hele verden. I Danmark er vi blandt de førende vikar- og rekrutteringsbureauer med fire afdelinger fordelt over hele landet. En position vi har opnået, fordi vi som eksperter på arbejdsmarkedet formår at matche kvalificerede kandidater med de rette jobmuligheder.

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Randstad is looking for energetic warehouse workers for ongoing temporary positions.

On behalf of our customer, DSV, worldwide leader in transport and logistics, we are looking for warehouse workers, who are eager to develop careers in a growing working environment.
The job provides opportunities for both professional and personal development.

Forklift certificate required in Pick and Pack department.

The company offers:
• Flexible working hours (2 shifts available)
• Competent training and coaching
• Salary according to your qualifications
• Attractive bonus system
• Possibility to attend language courses in Danish or English

Work tasks may include:
• Picking and packing according to orders instructions
• Performing picking tasks in a timely manner, respecting safety and quality guidelines
• Ensuring correct shipping information is attached

We expect that you:
• Speak and understand English
• Are willing to learn new systems
• Are flexible and proactive
• Can easily communicate within a team

Previous picking experience is an advantage.

Application:
Apply and build your career path via this page!
Interviews are held on an ongoing basis, and we therefore recommend that you apply as soon as possible.
 
About Randstad
Randstad DK is part of the international Randstad Group, which is the global leader in HR services. With more than 4,700 offices in 38 countries, we are providing work to more than 650,000 people every day.
In Denmark, we are among the leading temp and recruitment agencies with branches in Copenhagen, Aarhus, Aalborg and Kolding. A position we have achieved due to our expertise in matching qualified candidates with the right job opportunities.
